column3: ACK -- only a small issue that can wait:\n- The `CreateThread(Shutdown, NULL)` in bitcoinrpc.cpp should eventually be replaced with something that is safe with the GUI (just like needs to be done when calling 'stop'), as it will result in a race condition and segmentation fault. But for now, I think the number of users that use RPC to encrypt the wallet while running the UI is exactly zero.\n
